
=head1 NAME

file

=head1 DESCRIPTION



=head1 FIELDS

 image (character varying) - 
 file_type (character varying) - 
 dir (character varying) - 
 file (character varying) - 
 identifier (serial) - 


=head1 SCHEMA

                                          Table "gcis_metadata.file"
    Column   |       Type        |                     Modifiers                     | Storage  | Description 
 ------------+-------------------+---------------------------------------------------+----------+-------------
  image      | character varying | not null                                          | extended | 
  file_type  | character varying |                                                   | extended | 
  dir        | character varying |                                                   | extended | 
  file       | character varying |                                                   | extended | 
  identifier | integer           | not null default nextval('file_id_seq'::regclass) | plain    | 
 Indexes:
     "file_pkey" PRIMARY KEY, btree (identifier)
 Foreign-key constraints:
     "file_image" FOREIGN KEY (image) REFERENCES image(identifier) ON DELETE CASCADE
 Triggers:
     audit_trigger_row AFTER INSERT OR DELETE OR UPDATE ON file FOR EACH ROW EXECUTE PROCEDURE audit.if_modified_func('true')
     audit_trigger_stm AFTER TRUNCATE ON file FOR EACH STATEMENT EXECUTE PROCEDURE audit.if_modified_func('true')
 Has OIDs: no
 

=cut
